General.Name: Oncimmune Holdings plc
General.Description: Oncimmune Holdings plc develops and commercializes technologies that enable cancer diagnosis in the United Kingdom, North America, Europe, and internationally. It offers EarlyCDT-Lung, a immunodiagnostic test for detecting and identifying lung cancer. The company also develops SeroTag, a platform that is used to discover and validate biomarkers for stratifying patients in multiple cancer indications, infectious diseases, and with various autoimmune diseases; and NavigAID, a disease-specific characterization panel. Oncimmune Holdings plc has a collaboration with Siemens Healthineers AG. Oncimmune Holdings plc was incorporated in 2015 and is based in Leeds, the United Kingdom.
